input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Canon PIXMA MG3620 Printer Purchased Online

Hello Customer Support, I have recently bought a Canon PIXMA MG3620 printer My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Sadly, I am facing some difficulties with it You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.. Could you please help me in addressing this issue as soon as possible? Thank you. Best regards, <name>
